mapper.select: select SL_CODE AS slCode, PRODUCER_EP_ID AS producerEpId, CONTRACT_NO AS contractNo, AUTH_EP_NAME AS authEpName, AUTH_TERM_BEGIN AS authTermBegin, AUTH_TERM_END AS authTermEnd, AUTH_TERM_UNLIIMITED AS authTermUnliimited from sl_ep_agent_auth where SL_CODE=#{filterMap.slCode} AND DEL_FLG=#{filterMap.delFlg}

select EP_ID AS epId, MEMBER_ID AS memberId, MEMBER_DUTIES AS memberDuties, MEMBER_NAME AS memberName, MEMBER_AGE AS memberAge, MEMBER_EDUC AS memberEduc, MEMBER_TEL AS memberTel from sl_ep_manager where EP_ID=#{filterMap.epId} AND DEL_FLG=#{filterMap.delFlg}

select IFNULL(EP_ID,'') AS epId, IFNULL(BRAND_ID,'') AS brandId, IFNULL(BRAND_NAME,'') AS brandName, IFNULL(BRAND_CLASS,'') AS brandClass, IFNULL(BRAND_NO,'') AS brandNo, BRAND_TERM_BEGIN AS brandTermBegin, BRAND_TERM_END AS brandTermEnd from sl_ep_brand where EP_ID=#{filterMap.epId} AND DEL_FLG=#{filterMap.delFlg}

select IFNULL(SL_CODE,'') AS slCode, IFNULL(BRAND_EP_ID,'') AS brandEpId, IFNULL(BRAND_ID,'') AS brandId, IFNULL(BRAND_NAME,'') AS brandName, IFNULL(BRAND_TYPE,'') AS brandType, IFNULL(BRAND_CLASS,'') AS brandClass, IFNULL(CONTRACT_NO,'') AS contractNo, TERM_BEGIN AS termBegin, TERM_END AS termEnd from sl_pd_brand where SL_CODE=#{filterMap.slCode} AND DEL_FLG=#{filterMap.delFlg}

select IFNULL(SL_CODE,'') AS slCode, IFNULL(MEMBER_ID,'') AS memberId, IFNULL(LEADER_FLG,'') AS leaderFlg, IFNULL(MEMBER_NAME,'') AS memberName, IFNULL(MEMBER_AGE,'') AS memberAge, BIRTHDAY AS birthday, IFNULL(MEMBER_EDUC,'') AS memberEduc, IFNULL(MEMBER_TEL,'') AS memberTel from sl_ec_team where SL_CODE=#{filterMap.slCode} AND DEL_FLG=#{filterMap.delFlg}
select IFNULL(EP_ID,'') AS epId, IFNULL(CERT_ID,'') AS certId, IFNULL(CERT_NAME,'') AS certName from sl_ep_cert where EP_ID=#{filterMap.epId} AND DEL_FLG=#{filterMap.delFlg}
